website_summaries.verdict: Canned dog food in a wide range of meats for your dog's good health. Grain-free and high in protein.
pros: Many protein sources, including some uncommon ones like rabbit
Feed alone or mix with kibble
cons: You'll need to store leftovers in the fridge if your dog doesn't eat an entire can at one meal

customer_reviews.title: Wilderness Bayou Blend Dog Food. Blue Buffalo
customer_reviews.text: Our dog loves this food. We adopted Bailey in Louisiana and we say she is a "Southern Girl" so there is no reason she wouldn't like alligator and catfish. I read on one post that the dog had diarrhea so to prevent any problems I don't give our girl this food two days in a row. But no matter what she gets for her meals she always gets Blue Buffalo! It's the best quality food. Bailey is part of the family so giving her good food is important for her health.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: It is not a stew...
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I get confused with all the descriptions of canned dog food. The marketing teams are getting so creative... I feed my dog Taste of the Wild kibbles and thought I would complement it with canned food to vary his dinners a bit. This is a paste, not a stew, so you don't have the little morsels I was after, nor is there any type of gravy/sauce etc. I still use it, but it tends to stick together and to the bowl or kibbles and be difficult to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Laurence L.

customer_reviews.title: Miss leading, would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ingredients show Chicken but the label states NO CHICKEN! I purchased because NO CHICKEN only to find out it has Chicken in the ingredients. My dog is allergic to fowl which as you can guess this created a serious issue for her. I would not recommend purchasing until they figure out what truly is in this food, but I can tell you it does have Chicken!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Groover

customer_reviews.title: my dog loves this food
customer_reviews.text: my dog loves this food what’s really weird is she has increased energy and wants to play with her ball and toys again she is 10 years old and I attributed her lack of activity and motivation to her age but now I’m thinking it was possibly the dog food I was feeding her because she loves to play now so glad I substituted this
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it! I was feeding him a Costco brand for years and over time he developed itchy skin, a black belly and loose stools. I switched him to the Blue brand and his itching has just about ceased and his stools are firm again. Even the dark belly is beginning to turn pink again!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene H

customer_reviews.title: Texture
customer_reviews.text: Because Loki didn't like to eat it, I'm going to rate it as ok. Loki is finicky and yes I'm trained well. The others are good. He just doesn't prefer blended food. I need to watch more careful what I buy. I REALLY LIKE YOUR BRAND. Makes me feel comfortable that he's getting good quality food. Thank YOU.
customer_reviews.author: MojoAlex

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: The reason I gave this a poor rating is because our puppy is allergic to chicken and this product is very misleading! The label says non chicken ingredients here. Then when received the label says the 1st 2 ingredients are chicken and chicken broth.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: My dog won't eat it, and cans come damaged every time,
customer_reviews.text: My dog won't eat it, when I get it the cans are always damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Mz Nina, business consultant and aspiring artistTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: My Finicky Dog is Finally Happy at Meal Time!
customer_reviews.text: My finicky dog absolutely loves this brand of dog food. I have spent the last year buying a variety of foods to find one that he would eat more than once. This brand and it’s a variety of choices so far are the answer!
customer_reviews.author: Retired US Marine

customer_reviews.title: This is a winner! Three paws up
customer_reviews.text: Well, I myself don't love it but the pups are hysterically infatuated with it, and crowd around when they hear me break the seal. And a little bit goes a long way to making kibble a real treat, even with a picky eater.
customer_reviews.author: deejay

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for dogs
customer_reviews.text: all of my dogs tend to have sensitive skin. My vet recommended venison or rabbit since that is less likely to cause skin irritation or allergic reactions. My dogs love this food.
customer_reviews.author: cmullis

customer_reviews.title: Healthier choice of the Wilderness blends for the Doggo
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be my dog’s least favorite of the 5 flavors I ordered but I think it’s a healthier choice for her. The consistency leaves a little to be desired when mixing with dry food and water after it has been refrigerated per the manufacturer’s directions, but it also has low fat content being made of all venison and fish.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Gutman

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this stuff. I mix it with their dry and they clean it up. I think it is one of the healthier choices of canned dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Wilderness with alligator made both of my dogs sick
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs got very bad diarrhea after eating the Wilderness with alligator. That has never happened with any of the other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: jmr120

customer_reviews.title: The doggo loves it
customer_reviews.text: It's not runny, I can't attest to the flavor myself, but the doggo sits pretty waiting for it and makes it disappear immediately. Ingredients are appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fraudulent Product
customer_reviews.text: IT IS A FRAUD. You buy a can of dog food which is supposed to be high quality and be what is pictured on the can's label. Well, it is not. Almost all these niche dog food brands are primarily CHICKEN and trace amounts of what is on the label. So it is way over-priced. It's better to just make your own dog food since processed food, especially kibble, is not good for your pups. (Google it). I had to give my purchase away since my dog is allergic to chicken.
customer_reviews.author: Robert  Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients correct
customer_reviews.text: Said no chicken but had chicken on ingredients dog is allergic to chicken asked for refund
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: My dog liked at first, then not so much
customer_reviews.text: At first my dog (boxer) liked this canned dog food, she seems to like salmon. She eventually stopped eating it so idk.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Davis

customer_reviews.title: Pricy and overpriced !!️
customer_reviews.text: Too runny my dogs didn’t much like it Did not like their Bowels either , the one in the black can by someone else is much better
customer_reviews.author: Clyde

customer_reviews.title: My picky dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My picky eater LOVED this flavor! As soon as I opened a can she was waiting for her bowl and ate everything up right away, which is rare for her. Very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mmm, not sure
customer_reviews.text: Some dogs like and others don't. I think I need a variety pack because this may take a bit of time to get through.
customer_reviews.author: E. Durham

customer_reviews.title: Cans all dented
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed, ok but cans all dented. Not buying online again.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Canned dog Food
customer_reviews.text: My dog likes it, it's a pate, wish it came in a stew as well.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: My picky dog loves this kind. He didn't wait a second before digging in. Will be buying more cases of this for sure
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: Damaged and open can. Also, what's on the label, is not necessarily what's in the can. Read the Court docs...
customer_reviews.text: Good food but 1 can was smashed too much and popped open. I think the box was too big (other things were included) and it just moved around too much. Plastic holding cans together was worn through on all corners. Update: So I threw away the opened can... My dog loves this food, but guess what...it gives him projectile puking and diarrhea. Ugh. Took him to the vet. $$$ NO MORE BLUE BUFFALO! Changed the food and treats, no more puking or diarrhea. Simple. People, don't buy this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Guarantee NO Chicken - BUT first 3 ingredients are chick
customer_reviews.text: Please look at ingredients label - the first 3 ingredients are Chicken even though they promote none used!!!! If your dog has allergies this is bad!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it. Fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product for my fur baby! He loves this food.
customer_reviews.author: Weylin F.

customer_reviews.title: Dog hates it
customer_reviews.text: My dog will not eat it. It looks pretty soupy
customer_reviews.author: Kristin P. Morrill

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Dog loves it and wonderful Grain Free, which is important to the care of my dog
customer_reviews.author: JustME

customer_reviews.title: Great food and great nutrition
customer_reviews.text: Great product, delivers on its promise. Hopefully, it will assist in making my husky's coat more healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Our girl's favorite wet food
customer_reviews.text: Our dog LOVES this stuff. We buy it especially because we have no problems hiding her pills in it. She is a 100 pound Shiloh Shepherd.
customer_reviews.author: J. Watson

customer_reviews.title: don't overpay for what you are made to believe is good dog food when it is really just like any ...
customer_reviews.text: False claims by company. don't overpay for what you are made to believe is good dog food when it is really just like any cheap brand dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Kristine Smith

customer_reviews.title: Going to buy again
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this mixed in with his dry food
customer_reviews.author: doitright

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food and it is a healthy choice
customer_reviews.author: Janice Thomad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these so much that he’s a big stiff about eating dry food without it
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dogs don't like this flavor as much as the others.
customer_reviews.author: Donna H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken apart with all cans dented. Not sure I’ll feed this to my pupper, might just return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for my dog with allergies but she wouldn't eat it.
customer_reviews.author: becklynne

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought various wet food for my dog up to this point and was disappointed as he would not really eat much. As soon as I open this can, he smells it and gets excited. He eats his whole meal every time!
customer_reviews.author: Deidre

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of poultry for my allergic dog...
customer_reviews.text: "No chicken (or poultry) by-product meals" is the fourth bullet in the description. 4 out of the first 5 ingredients is poultry...My dog is allergic... Ingredients: Chicken, Chicken Broth, Fish Broth, Chicken Liver, Turkey....
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My fur baby loves this, she will only eat Blue Buffalo.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Canned Dog food
customer_reviews.text: Great dog food. When "you" love your dog , you want the best for 'em ❕❗❕ .
customer_reviews.author: Josef Curdo

customer_reviews.title: We have three dogs, two pits and a poodle ...
customer_reviews.text: We have three dogs, two pits and a poodle, and not one of them will eat this food, I ended up donating it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Smith

product_meta.title: Blue Buffalo Wilderness Regional Recipes High Protein Grain Free Natural Wet Dog Food, 12.5-oz cans (Pack of 12)
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Snake River Grill with Trout| Size:12.5 oz (Pack of 12)Inspired by the Snake River and surrounding lands, BLUE Wilderness Snake River Grill wet dog food is made to feed your dog’s most primal instincts. With a blend of trout, venison and rabbit, plus fruits and vegetables, this grain free recipe is made with the finest natural ingredients enhanced with vitamins and minerals. Formulated for the health and well-being of your adult dog, this wet food features high-quality protein sources to help supply the energy he needs while promoting healthy muscle growth.
feature_bullets: PACKED WITH REAL TROUT: This grain free dog food is packed with an exotic blend of trout, venison and rabbit
FEED THREE WAYS: High protein BLUE Wilderness Snake River Grill adult dog food makes a delicious treat, adds interest mixed into their favorite dry foods or can be fed as a meal on its own
NATURAL DOG FOOD: All BLUE canned dog foods are made with the finest natural ingredients enhanced with vitamins and minerals

WHOLESOME INGREDIENTS: BLUE wet dog food contains NO chicken (or poultry) by-product meals, NO corn, wheat (a common thickening agent used by many other brands) or soy, and NO artificial flavors or preservatives
Contains twelve (12) 12.5-oz cans of BLUE Wilderness Snake River Grill High Protein Grain Free, Natural Wet Dog Food, Trout, Venison & Rabbit
